Press_1_1.0: Friends are like stars, they come and go, but the ones that stay are the ones that glow!!!!

Press_1_1.1: True friends are never apart. Maybe in distance, but not in heart.

Press_1_1.2: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

Press_1_1.3: Good Friends Are Hard to Find, Difficult to Leave, Impossible to Forget.

Press_1_1.4: A brother may not be a friend, but a friend will always be a brother.

Press_1_1.5: Friendship is the only cement that will hold the world together

Press_1_2.0: Self-preservation is the first law of nature.- Samuel Butler

Press_1_2.1: Be truthful, nature only sides with truth.- Adolf Loos

Press_1_2.2: A good river is natures life work in song

Press_1_3.0: Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.- G. K. Nielson

Press_1_3.1: Success is a journey, not a destination.- Ben Sweetland

Press_1_3.2: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.- Shahrukh Khan

Press_1_3.3: A life of success and achievement is a direct result of utilizing the power of positive thinking.

Press_1_4.0: Every time you subtract negative from your life, you make room for more positive

Press_1_4.1: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.- Michael Jordan

Press_1_4.3: Stay strong, be positive. We all struggle sometimes.

Press_1_4.4: The most important thing is to stay positive.- Saku Koivu

Press_1_5.0: Every story has an end, but in life every ending is just a new beginning

Press_1_5.1: Never stop learning, because life never stops teaching.

Press_1_5.2: You have to fight through some bad days to earn the best days of your life

Press_1_5.3: Always choose the right path and speak the truth.

Press_1_5.4: A good life is a collection of happy moments.
